steps.name: User click  on MyAccount
If Register option is displayed User click on Register
User should see Register Account form
User should see Your Personal Details section with fields: 'First Name', 'Last Name', 'E-Mail','Telephone'
User should see Your Password section: 'Password' and 'Password Confirm'
User fill out Register form with information below
Verify 'Newsletter' section present
Verify 'No' Radio button is selected by default
User selects 'Yes' to subscribe
Verify 'Continue' button is displayed
Verify check box 'I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy' next to 'Continue' button
Click on check box
Click on 'Continue' button
Text should be displayed 'Your Account Has Been Created!'
User is on Retail website

steps.name: User click  on MyAccount
Verify that Login sub-option in My Account menu and click on Login
Verify Login form Returning customer is displayed
User enter username 'karen@gmail.com' and password 'loren123'
User click on Login button
User click  on MyAccount
Verify that Logout sub-option is displayed in My Account drop-down menu
User click on Logout

Verify Message appeared when user logged out - 'You have been logged off your account. It is now safe to leave the computer. Your shopping cart has been saved, the items inside it will be restored whenever you log back into your account.'

arguments.val: You have been logged off your account. It is now safe to leave the computer. Your shopping cart has been saved, the items inside it will be restored whenever you log back into your account.

steps.name: User see Currency button on the left of the page
US Dollar Currency selected by default
User click on Currency button
Verify Currency drop-down menu contains 'Euro', 'Pound Sterling' and 'US Dollar' options
User selects Pound Sterling currency
User clicks on 'Tablets' product Menu
User clicks on product 'Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1'
Verify Price of the Product in Pound Sterling
User click on Heart icon
User click  on MyAccount
Verify that Login sub-option in My Account menu and click on Login
User enter username 'karen@gmail.com' and password 'loren123'
User click on Login button
User click on Menu 'Wish List' and user can see the added product
Verify Price of the product in Pound Sterling in the Wish List
User click  on MyAccount
Verify that Logout sub-option is displayed in My Account drop-down menu
User click on Logout
User click  on MyAccount
Verify that Login sub-option in My Account menu and click on Login
User enter username 'karen@gmail.com' and password 'loren123'
User click on Login button
User click on Menu 'Wish List' and user can see the added product
Verify Price of the product in Pound Sterling in the Wish List
User is on Retail website

elements.name: I) Calculate total cost for Products in the Shopping Cart

steps.name: User clicks on 'Tablets' product Menu
User clicks on product 'Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1'
User clicks on 'Add to Cart' button
User clicks on 'Add to Cart' button
User click on 'Shopping Cart'
Verify that same item not repeated in Shopping Cart
Verify Unit Price and Total columns are displayed
Verify Total price should be the number equals Quantity times Unit Price
Verify section 'What would you like to do next?' is displayed
Verify 'Use Coupon Code' section is displayed
Verify 'Estimate Shipping & Taxes' section is displayed
Select shipping destination by selecting Shipping country 'United States', state 'North Carolina' and postCode '28277'
User click get Quotes button
Verify flat rate is displayed and check radio button to add shipping cost to total
User click Apply Shipping
Verify total price is calculated correctly including shipping cost
Verify checkout button displayed
